title: No one likes the assassin rework riot. MAINS
body:
None of the mains like this shit. REVERT IT

Played a kat main, she was fed, hates the rework. its so bull shit. Akali main, hates it. completely shit.

replies.body:
People don't like Kat's rework because now she has counterplay.
Her kit is much better, coming from a kat main, and she has a much higher skill cap and floor. People can't just pick her up and go 20/1 anymore, unless you're facing apes.
Fizz's rework was bad.
Talon is arguably the same as before in terms of play rate and win rate.
Leblanc is... Still leblanc except there's more of her on the map now
Shaco is still shaco
Zed basically had no changes
And they definitely screwed with Akali. Her passive is worse, her ult deals less damage, and that little jump on her W really wasn't worth all those nerfs.

Idk. The rework was good, since it added counterplay to these assassins, but it is bad because it screwed with the assassins logic of: Kill them in one shot, get out or die.

you're wrong about akali

And they definitely screwed with Akali. Her passive is worse, her ult deals less damage, and that little jump on her W really wasn't worth all those nerfs.

I've played Katarina enough both pre and after rework to say

Katarina's rework did not give her a higher skillcap.

You learn her combos and you're 10 times the old Katarina with way LESS counterplay.

SO you're saying the telegraphed damage and ult range **isn't** a nerf to her old self? She was unhealthy pre rework. Either she died to cc or she gets a triple or more. The new kat can still be counterplayed believe it or not. There's something called not running into her knives.
No, it has nothing to do with that really. Her damage is absurd, and if you know her combos well you'd also know the combos in which the "telegraphed damage" can basically not be avoided.
